p: Compound 20a also adopted binding orientations in which the naphthalenyl-thiourea side chain superpose the position of 4-fluorophenyl-carboxamide moiety in compound 3, Figure 10. Moreover, the phenyl-carboxamide side chain in compound 20a adopted an orientation superposing over the position of the difluorophenyl-carboxamide chain in LZ9, while the pyrrole ring in compound 20a overlaid partially over the pyrazole ring in LZ9.
